title: Try to handle the Sept. 6 switchover.
message:
Try to handle the Sept. 6 switchover.

On Setp. 6, the LTC will be changing all of it's route information and
bus names. I have no idea what that will look like on WebWatch, but I'm
hoping updating the bus data will be enough.

In order to make sure people have the updated bus data, This commit
will, once Sept. 6 is past, treat all bus data from before the switch as
expired, regardless of the date.

title: Disable route information proxy
message:
Disable route information proxy

The proxy is running on Fraser's server. He would like to shut it down.
Until a new proxy can be set up, the app will have to run without one.

title: Import the Android Studio project
message:
Import the Android Studio project

At some point Fraser converted this app to work in Android Studio
instead of Eclipse. At that point it was removed from version control.
This change brings the latest version of the app back under version
control, hopefully tracking as much of the changes as possible.

title: Move the project out of the LTC folder.
message:
Move the project out of the LTC folder.

The entire project is now in the repository root, to facilite merging
with the new version of the code that has been imported into Android
Studio.
